mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your every whim is our command. Get ready to experience the royal treatment you deserve!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this-I'm strolling into Bank of Entitlement with my entourage in tow, feeling like the king of entitlement, as usual. I saunter up to the teller and demand to speak with the branch manager immediately. Why? Oh, just because I can. The manager rushes over, visibly flustered, and asks how he can assist me. I lean in, adjusting my sunglasses, and declare in my most commanding tone, "I demand a personal gold-plated ATM installed in my mansion by tomorrow morning-it's simply unacceptable that I have to drive all the way here to access my funds like a commoner." The manager, clearly intimidated by my presence, stammers out an apology and promises to make it happen. As I sashay out of the bank, I can't help but feel a rush of satisfaction. Who needs to abide by the rules when you're as entitled as I am? Ah, the sweet taste of victory-it's good to be me.
